extendedInfo.description: Heads-up version of popular casino craze!  3D graphics and challenging computerized opponent make for hours of fun.  NOTE: Computer opponent does NOT cheat in any way unlike many other head's up Texas Hold'Em titles.

reviews.title: Glen
reviews.comment: Good app but has a bug. Once computer has its last money in pot it doent matter if he wins or not the guest always wins. Needs a fix!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame Expert mode
reviews.comment: You can bluff 90% of the time. Even on Expert mode the computer bets insanely with no hand and pulls a pair of 9s on the River. No challenge. Maybe add a third and / or fourth player to the table for some competition.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very amateur, but fun game to play and keep your skills fresh if you don\'t play real poker much
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Rubbish. Folds far to much even with 2 or 3 kings on the table. Then will play a hand like 2 and 5 right through no pairs or anything no bets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Computer folds at the weakest bet
reviews.comment: Sucks, don\'t waist ur time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Basic
reviews.comment: Pretty simple but fun. Just don\'t expect to be blown away.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Far 2 easy,beat the computer 3times in 3 games on expert + could do with more players at the table!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is way too easy. It has to be the worst Texas Hold em i have pkayed. Also the cheat is the proof u need 4 how lame it really is
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely poker
reviews.comment: Great app for offline playing, not perfect though, like my opponent ALWAYS folds when I bet over 200$. Not bad at all though, nice simple app for killing time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This game sucks balls
reviews.comment: The computer knows your hand and its really obvious. I start with a pair and the computer already folds...  games a joke
reviews.author: Sung Paek

reviews.comment: Its good but when u got a thousand...no matter what when computer loses it starts u over to. ..u dont keep ur money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool but not smooth, too glitchy, and the effects are slow. BTW, it is also veeeeeeeery easy. Too bad...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs...
reviews.comment: There needs to be a button that can go back and edit the game settings a.k.a. computer level and pot limit
reviews.author: Cameron King

reviews.title: Kim
reviews.comment: Not bad, fun time killer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun, but buggy. On a g1/froyo it stops showing cards. Buttons for call / raise too close together. AI seems ok with brief playtime.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate this pos game
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t cheat my ads the computer played 6 full houses in a row and only had it twice I\'m deleting it now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Works wonderfully, fun for those who have poor coverage, I wish their were more computer players to play against
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: DROID RAZR _ no buttons work. Can\'t do anything. Tried restarting phone, same problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The computer, even @ expert level, plays terrible. No poker logic at all. Still a good time killer but this is not a realistic \"heads up\" opponent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Moronic
reviews.comment: No sane person would go all in with a pair of 2\'s king high.  The AI is not very intelligent
reviews.author: A Google User
